Description: Papyrus; Demotic text mentioning soldiers, and referring to pharaoh's palace, and the death of the great one of the Medes(?); lots of deaths mentioned. Manual of divination.
Curator's comments: Information on content courtesy of C. J. Martin. Mentioned in BMQ 1931-2.To be published by Carol Andrews, cf. Acta Demotica (Pisa 1994) = EVO 17, pp. 22-37; Quack, ‘Ist der Meder am allem schuld’, in A. Jördens and J. F. Quack, Ägypten zwischen innerem Zwist, Philippika 45, 2011, p. 130.
To be published by Carol Andrews, Acta Demotica (Pisa 1994) = EVO 17, pp. 22-37.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (47514) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/47514)
